content.detailedDescription: I was living outside of military base in a home in iraklion greece. my husband was in the air force with a top secret clearance. something woke me up and there was a presence in the hallway that i could not see. i looked out the window and i seen lights turning in a circle off in a distance. i screamed husbands name several times to wake up. he never woke up. i am not sure what woke me up but there was something in my room that woke me up for sure. the presence was very real and intense feeling. that is what made me look outside to then see the lights going round and round.
content.summary: Waking up of something very strange then looking out window to see lights going in circle.

content.detailedDescription:
Our house was up against the desert.  i saw it from the back porch.  saw it as it came up to the mountain in the back yard.  it hovered for a minutes then it went around the mountain out of site.  few minutes later a helicopter appeared and went around the mountain as well.

earlier that same year, my father and his best friend mac were chased by a saucer through the road that lead up to the satellite place. i cant remember what the name of it was but my dad was a satellite repair man, and later taught it in ft monmouth, nj.  they are both dead now but my dad mentioned it again before he died and also told us when it happened.  he was debriefed by the military before he came home that nite. we were later moved to germany in oct 1964.  i was 9 years old when this happened.

in 1963 the sheriff of the town we lived in asked my father to go with him to a site.  my dad went with him.  when they came back my dad said that he had seen a ufo with the sheriff.  it is the sheriff that you all have profiled before.  lonnie zamora.  my father was with him when he saw it.  lonnie never told anyone that my dad was with him because of my dad being in the army, and lonnie being on duty. lonnie was always at our house.  him and dad had been friends for many years.

i so believe in flyer saucer and im 60 now.  i wanted my stories to get out there.
content.summary: I saw a ufo while we were stationed in white sands missle range

content.detailedDescription: Friend and i saw bright object to the north-west above the horizon. it had twin tails that looked like flame. the object would brighten then dim and disappear to reappear a short distance away. it moved away to the north-west until we lost it in the haze. this was our second or third sighting of an unknown object. all the object we've seen have had an orenge color. for this one i took pictures as my friend looked through bi-no's and told me when it was brightest. all three object that we have seen are in the direction of handford.
content.summary: White object with twin flame tails. blinked out anf moved to new location.

content.detailedDescription: In 1985 i was coming back from california with a load to dallas tx on interstate 20 coming up out of van horn texas.Got to the 173 mm and there was an old man it seemed with a motorcycle out of gas and a ways from a gas station. pulled over to help and while i was talking to him he was looking north and i looked over his shoulder up at the mesa in front of me.The ship was  what looked like aluminum in a shape that looked like two cigars put together in a pattern of a compass north south east and west. no doors no windows no seams and emaninating from the craft was a light like a flourecent light but not like any light i have ever seen.As i looked above it as it was going up and it didnt seem like it was in a big hurry like a real slow ascent.The area at this location is an area where you can see the open sky for about 30 miles in any direction but not right over the craft. thsky all around weas black and grey and completely overcast except for right over the craft.This craft was about a 1/4 mile long and covered the mesa.The open clouds above it were enfloding around in a circle as wide as the craft the only open place in the whole sky.The clouds were enfolding to keep the hole open which i do believe i witnessed the bottom of a wormhole.The ship rose up very slowly and went through the hole in the clouds and the hole closed up in a circular fashion.This whole event took about 2 minutes maybe maybe not that long.I asked the old man if he wanted a ride to the station to get a little gas the i would bring him back and he said no he would be ok. so i left and didnt even think about anything ubtil i got down the road about 20 miles down the road and realized that the old man never said a word during this whole event.As if i were supposed to see this event. but this is not the only one i have seen i have seen others and different kinds and been aboard one.I dont have a drawing of the one on the mesa but i can draw you one of all of the ones i have seen and draw you a picture of the propultion system i was shown if you want.Or the writing i was shown.
content.summary: Ufo was ascending into a wormhole

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving alone, exiting route 91 at northampton, mass., around 6 pm. not sure of date or season, but it was still light out.

i was stopped at the traffic light at the intersection at the end of the exit road.
there was probably other traffic around. i don't recall.

i had reason to look out my driver's side window and up, but i have no idea what that reason may have been. maybe a sound? not sure.

above me was something khaki-colored, looked to be metal (resembled the color of an army tank, solid metal-seeming).

it was absolutely stationary. i heard no sound, so i don't know what called my attention.

i do not know if anybody else saw this. i can't imagine i was the only one.

i'm tempted to say this craft was the size of a football field; for sure it was an enormous rectangle, and from inside the car i could not see the perimeter at all.

i think the thing had features (closed hatches, maybe?), but at this point in time i am not sure. i can say the image of this craft is imprinted in my mind clear as day now, 35 years later, as if a photographic image.

the traffic light changed. i moved. i think the craft did not move with me.

then i remember looking for other ufos for a long time after (it was in the berkshire mountains, western massachusetts) and i remember being disappointed that i never saw another.

i had no feeling: not awe; not fear; just as if this was a matter-of-fact experience. there it was, directly above me, low, but not threatening.

the date i am giving you is probably not accurate, but you're asking for specifics ...
content.summary: Enormous object above my car

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my bedroom asleep and was awoken.  it was just at the crack of dawn when something very tall came floating towards me. it bent over and was only a few inches from my face.  i was not frightened but i was frozen; i couldn't move.  it was dark and tall. there was no face.  it telepathically asked me if i wanted to leave.  i replied no.  it then said, "we will be back to get you; when it is time."  it was very humane because it said i was cold and it moved my sheet to my neck.  it then stood upright and left the room the same way it entered.
i have only told a few people in my entire life.  one person was a shaman for a native american tribe in new mexico.  he said that the certain native american's have had similar experiences and yes they come at the crack of dawn to disguise their ship from being spotted.  it seems the sun is so bright on the horizon the human eye can't see it in the morning beams. 
i can provide a sketch if anyone wants me to submit one.  i will never forget what happened and i feel very special and privileged to have had contact with something that i can't logically explain.
content.summary: I woke up to an entity floating towards me. it asked me if i was wanted to leave and i said no. it then responded,

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking to work at a bakery down some railroad tracks when i heard a 
soft hum and looked in time to see a circular craft land softly in a field
on one side of the tracks. as i watched, three child sized beings appeared
outside the craft and just walked around. they appeared to see me and
returned to the craft. i continued walking to work. i never told anyone til
now. i was 21 or 22 then. i'm 64 now.
content.summary: I was walking to work down railroad tracksand saw it land in a field to one side of the tracks then 3 entities got out, walked around then returned to the craft. i went to work at the bakery.

content.detailedDescription:
This is a report i posted on another website before i learned of mufon.  i don't know how long the lights were there. i remember i was amazed by this super cell thunderstorm i was approaching so i was watching the lightning show.  at one point out of the corner of my eye i noticed these lights in the sky.  it was dark so there was no shape just the amber lights.  it would be hard to tell the distance.  it was clearly above the horizon above any other farm yard lights.  if i held my hand out at arms length i'd say if i held my thumb and finger out to measure the distance the light took up was maybe 6 inches apart.  they were maybe aspirin sized and i'd say at least 1/4 to 1/2 mile away.  below is my account the way i remembered it back in 2012.  i'd have to say i was not surprised at what i saw.  i feel the universe is to big to believe we are the only intelligent life that exists.  i've always looked up every time i go outside wondering what else is out there.  i did contact the state patrol after i returned from my fishing trip.  they got back with me and said there were no other reports and the air force base in omaha didn't report any in the area that night.  i would like to do a video animation of what i remembered.  i haven't yet.

occurred : 5/17/2012 22:30 (entered as : 5/17/2012 22:50)
reported: 5/21/2012 7:34:35 am 07:34
posted: 6/2/2012
location: o'neil, ne
shape: light
duration:30 seconds to 1 minute
 
about 10:30 pm i noticed a string of yellow/orange lights in the sky on northern nebraska.

i saw something strange around 10:30 pm. basically i was driving north from o'neil towards spencer on hwy 281 in nebraska and i was watching the sky because there was a storm in the distance to the northwest of me and clear skies north and east of me. when suddenly i noticed lights north of me just to the east side of the hwy. the lights were clearly above the horizon in the sky. it seemed like they might have been moving independently then they came together in a horizontal row of 4 lights and were evenly spaced apart. the cluster appeared to be hovering. then they began to move, but the cluster as a whole stayed in the same place. the light on the right side of the row of 4 lights stayed stationary the entire time and the other 3 began to scroll toward the stationary light. it was like the lights were on something round and it was rotating right so the lights were still evenly spaced and moving toward the stationary light. when a light came close to the stationary light it would disappear and a new light would appear on the left side of the 4 lights. it scrolled like this 5-10 seconds or so. then the outside 2 lights stayed stationary. so between the 2 stationary lights from the left to right a light would scroll toward the one stationary light on the right side and it would disappear when it reached the light and a new one would come out from the stationary one on the left move over to the stationary light on the right again. it did this 5-10 seconds or so and i went to grab my camera and just before i turned it on they all just went out and i never saw them again. it was strange. i've never seen anything i couldn't explain before so this was a first. i am curious if anyone else reported anything.
content.summary: A set of amber colored lights hovered and moved in the sky near a thunder storm.

content.detailedDescription: three of us cousins were sleeping outdoors in an unused field on my dads farm in the 1950's, on mission rd., jessup md.About august, when, about 10 or 11 at night we all looked up and saw three stars, very far away, apparently shooting at each other.  the three stars were  in a right angle triangle and a moving small light from each of the stars on the end originated a bit from the star and proceded toward the corner star. the light, which seemed like another star would slowly move toward the corner star then go out and disapear about a 1/4 inch before it would have hit the corner star. the 1/4 inch is arrived at if you held your hand out at arms length and put your thumb where the three stars were. the stars were about two thumbs width apart. so both stars sent a small light ball toward the corner star and the corner star would send a ball of light or shoot ,randomly toward the other two stars. this  lasted for at least 30 min. one of the older cousins is still living and quite a few years ago , when i asked said" yes, i remember something happened that night" i never asked for any more confirmation. i know what we all saw. during this display of the stars all shooting at each other, it was about 10 to 15 sec between random shots maybe, all the other stars in a normal night sky were visable. i am saying this as i was told that at the distance stars are from the earth that there is no way a light could go from one star to another as it would take light years so what i saw must have been really close to earth.  i dont believe that at all. i feel those three stars, which i feel are likely in the same place as they were in the 1950's were many light years from us and somehow defies physics as we now it to be shooting at each other.
content.summary: Three stars were shooting at each other.

content.detailedDescription: Grand sons and i were leaving the skate rink and to head home and noticed a large bright lite several mile toward our direction home. as we traveled down hwy 95 out of the city of bastrop it seemed as though the light was matching our line of movement. i turned off hwy state hwy 95 to state hwy 1441 and went east for a few miles and the light matched our line of travel until we turned right off 1441 to green valley dr. the light hovered above the power poles and street light at the intersection of plumb and green valley.  i stopped the car at the intersection ( 1441 and green valley) and waited to see what the light was going to do but after sitting there a few minutes i decided to head home and drive under the light but my grandkids were scared so i waited a few more minutes before heading to the intersection. i drove under the light and turned at the intersection to get home. as i turned i looked out the window and looked up to see why the sky got so dark in spite of the bright light and saw what it was. it was a large triangular craft about 20 feet above the car. it had what appeared to be navigation lights down the sides. it made no noise nor was there any wind blowing. we drove two blocks to the house and pulled into the driveway, jumped out of the car and watched the thing climb in altitude and continue out of sight. i am a veteran of the usaf and was trained on jet aircraft but i have never seen any such air craft.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: First sighted brilliant white light about 12 miles away about 1200 feet in air.(?) seemed to follow direction of car. turned off highway to road to the house and the light appeared over intersection and seemed to float down to several feet above a lighted

content.detailedDescription: Hanging out with friends on 16th street near north street. saw a bright light coming from the east. landing lights of a airplane. object went from real small to a size of a city block in length. it went from travelling west to travelling southwest. i could not believe what i am seeing. after which no one would believe me. it travelled beyond my sight over the trees. had no sound.
content.summary: Saw ufo close, could see in windows, saw one human like, and many small child like

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i went out on the balcony of our apartment to smoke a cigarette when a bright blue light seemed to be hovering in the air in our complex. it quickly changed directions a few times, zipping from left to right, then forward towards us, then straight up and out of sight. we both looked at each other after the event in disbelief and asked if we each saw the same thing. there was a feeling of excitement and disbelief over what we had just scene. neither one of us discount the possibility of life on other planets so we kind of forgot about it for awhile. there was no sound, no wind, no strange weather that evening either. it was a mild november evening. we do live near two airports and there are always planes in the sky, this was not the name lights we were used to seeing.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright blue star like light zipping in the air then quickly ascending out of sight

content.detailedDescription: My family & i were going on a fishing trip one cool morning. as we drove through the channel in my fathers 18 ft. boat we noticed something in the water. my father first seen it.He acted startled & when we all seen it we were all afraid. we had to drive around the object for it was directly in the middle of the channel.My broth 9 years old & i 11 were frightened due to the fact that the object was larger than our boat & also our parents were scared too.The best i can describe the object is black in color, shiny & smooth like a dolphins skin. the object appeared to be rolling through the water like a snake, continually. we got around the object and my father put the throttle down & we got out of there quick. we never spoke of the incident until a few years ago. we all seen the same thing but no one can explain it. this happened almost 25 years ago & just wanted to share our story. are there any other sightings like this reported on lake erie?
content.summary: Our family witnessed a large, black, serpent like object rolling in the bay as going by. 6ft. hight 10ft wide 30ft long.

content.detailedDescription: My mother, dad & i were at a public swimming lake near otatha ks, around the early 1960's. my dad & i were in the water. i had swam out to the dock at the end of the corded off area. when i came up i turned to the beach where my mother sat. that's when i saw the 2 large silver saucer shaped objects hovering above yet just past the beach. my dad came up next to me in the water & i pointed to the objects. we both watched them for a moment till they made a sharp angle turn & shot off, disappearing in  an instant. we never reported it. i'm haunted by wat we saw. just hope some day i will have answers before i die.
content.summary: Was with my dad swimming at a lake when we both saw the ufos.

content.detailedDescription: Watched white speres pass by a mile or so in the air 3 days in a row at about the same time everyday, then at the same point every time would turn nearly straight up & disappear into space it looked like, & the last time we saw this happen a green glowing object pass right abouve us about 20ft & landed in someones back yard. we all felt like we were frozen for a few seconds or so. the objects that were flying over head did not seem to make any noise we could hear. it seems quite surreal because when the last sphere that went by turned up & disappeared into space is when the glowing whatever it was came zooming over our heads at fairly horizontal angle from the direction the spheres went. 3 of us witnessed this at the same time. another friend of ours showed up not long talking about the green glowing object he had seen from across town. it is a fairly small town. i just have always wondered about this & wondered if there were other reported incidents of this in the port arthur, texas area. we were actually in a suburb called port acres. this was sometime between 1972-73 we were all to afraid to go into the neighbors backyard & look for the abject that fell.
content.summary: Watched white speres pass by a mile or so in the air 3 days in a row, then at the same ponit would turn nearly straight up & disappear into space looked like & the last time i saw this happen a green glowing object pass right abouve us & landed yard

content.detailedDescription: I was at work on the local air force base in my area. i work as a civilian housekeeper. at the time i was taking the trace out and i for some reason i looked up. i watched this cylinder shape object slowly cruise across the sky as if it was just gliding slowly. i've never seen anything like this. right behind it was clearly a jet or a airplane i don't know which but it had a strean coming from behind it. it was following the object at a steady pace never getting to close.I caught most of it on video with my phone. i put my phone away cause we're not suppose to have them. as i watched for the next few mins the further the object got it got smaller till it looked like a bright star and then it just vanished leaving nothing there but the jet. monents later as stood there looking in amazement a military patrol car passes by so i went on with my work. i had been working there since april of this year but that evening there was heavy air traffic after the event.  i couldn't help but wonder did the two have something to do with each other because i had never seen that much air traffic over the base since i worked there. shortly after i was fired and told they didn't have to give me a reason why they were letting me go.
content.summary: Unknown cylinder shape object being trailed by jet/airplane over military base

content.detailedDescription:
Was during the early hours of the morning. i was consistently awake all night feeling uneasy. i finally fell asleep only to shortly be awakened paralyzed hearing a wub wub wub in my ears. a brief moment later this, what appeared to be a blonde woman like figure about 5 feet tall manifested out of the center of the room and came towards me. now i'm really scared now and trying to move to get away from it. there was some type of scanner or device in it's hand and it started scanning my genitals, i could feel the heat from the device. the device was emitting a white laser light dim beam that didn't appear to have a light signature on the blankets. the event was quite uncomfortable as i was still fighting to move while my genitals were consistently getting hotter. i finally was able to move, though it was not graceful at all by any means and reached up as best as i could and grabbed the arm of this "lady", as soon as i did it looked surprised and backed up with me still holding on and vanished into the air again while i fell semi out of bed and able to catch myself before hitting the floor. this was the first encounter and most memorable, as i don't remember the others but i always wake up and try to move when i hear that wub wub or static sound in my sleep. once in afghanistan it happened to me also but i had woken when i heard the noises and had my rifle in my lap. it appeared and shined a reddish light at me then immediately vanished, unable to identify it other than it was not a blonde female that time, but was the same height. these two "sightings" are about 6 years apart.

i hope it's not a bother but i'm going to put everything in this one submission. i am military, events of this nature happened even before i joined. it was never up close that i have seen a ufo, but my wife has seen it right above our house before, it doesn't emit light at all. but its the same type of ufo i see when i see it or what i would hope is the same. never have seen a different variation. it's always right above me or out of my eye sight and mostly daytime when i have this weird feeling to just look up in the air like a crazy person. it is a definitive disk with what appears to be two disks in one similar to looking at a plate from the bottom and it is metallic. it has never emitted any light that i have seen. but i have seen it at every house that i have moved to. i believe it is the same craft every time. it has to be, there's no way it just shows up randomly following me around the world.

i do not want to be contacted or sought after or otherwise interviewed. i have a clearance with the federal government that is in no way related to my personal events, i'm a veteran and i'm a military member. i wish to remain completely anonymous.
content.summary: A tallish blonde woman figure came out of nowhere during early hours

content.detailedDescription: I was about 15 years old, sleeping in my first-floor bedroom in my family home. i was awakened by a loud hum, getting louder. it was about 11 p.M. i sat up in bed and looked out the window, which was open, toward the road. i saw blinking lights, yellow/orange, red, and green. i climbed out of bed and stood briefly by the window. the object was moving slowly from east to west along a point parallel to the road, but, it seemed to me, closer to my house than the road -- about 25 feet from the house and about four feet above the ground. the object was humming loudly and blinking yellow/orange, red, and green lights, and traveling very slowly (about 10-15 mph). i at first thought it was farm equipment or an emergency vehicle, but then i realized it was very late, the lights were something i had never seen, and the object seemed to be hovering and was moving slowly parallel to the road but not on the road.  i became frightened and crouched down behind the window sill, still looking out. the object continued at a steady pace on an east to west course, blinking and humming, and it appeared to be hovering about four feet above the ground between the trees in my front yard but not on the road. it didn't diminish pace or stop flashing, but slowly receded into the distance. the hum receded, too.  the object was between 7 and 15 feet in length, but didn't have a clear shape.
content.summary: Heard humming. saw craft through window. craft hovered in straight-line path through yard.

content.detailedDescription: A bright ufo passed over the tree tops as me and my brother were walking home.We never talked about it but it definitely was something that cannot be explained.I still see it in my mind 35 years later.
content.summary: A bright object that crossed in front of my brother and i when we were walking home while it was snowing.

content.detailedDescription:
In early april 1987,i observed a triangle shaped vehicle slowly moving over the base. i was there at 2100 hours just drinking a beer and  then heading back to the uss foresstal cv-59. i was only at my command for less than three months and just wanted to be by my self for a few hours to  relaxe. i returned to ship and my buddy that let me use his car wanted to know why i was so late returning. the time was around midnight. and i was only gone from the ship for under an hour,that's what i thought until he showed me the time.
but i witnessed the object moving so slow that it was impossible to stay in the air,it was triangle shaped and dark in color that had eight lights down each of the three sides and this thing was beautiful to look at,my body felt like all of it was vibrating at an incredible way like i was pulsating and then when i looked back up the thing started to move south over the base and the helos where on a landing approach to the airfield and the thing slowly moved away from the base south. i reported this to the petty officer of the watch when i returned to the ship and was told to hit my rack and i never heard of anything after that. i was a new recruit and an airman apprentice, we were told to mind our own bussiness and to speak of this no more.
i'm 52 now and was 23 then. i know what i saw and they wanted no mention of this to anyone.
content.summary: Was on beach at base,looked up like i always did and saw a triangle shaped vehicle slowly moving over base.

content.detailedDescription: It was late at night my boyfriend /husband now were fighting and had made a mess broken dishes we took our trash to the west creek about 1/8 of a mile from the house it was just us two at home its an isolated place in the country the closest house is 1/2 mile away,anyway my husband and i were cleaning up our dishes we broke i stayed home finished straightening up and jim drove our trash to w.Creek to dump our trash i decided to go outside and wait for him to come back so i went outside and sat on the east side of the house onthe porch i was looking west and then i got this weird feeling i looked up a saw this huge black no sound object above me i thought to myself what am i seeing the stars were gone and somehing in my head said get up and go in the house out of the corner of my eye i saw something black walking towards me thinking it was my boyfriend at the time still feeling angry looked straight ahead but to me it walked just like jim i felt scared for a moment i just got to the door and pulled the screen door shut but barely closed the inside door thinking why is he walking back up here when he drove the pickup to the w. creek,i proceeded to the living room and sat on the bed waiting on him to walk in the door any second. i thought to myself why isn't he coming in about that time i hear the truck coming from the creek,i was thinking what?! who was just outside?!! jim comes in and i aked him were you just up here which i thought was impossible, he said no i was taking our trash to the creek he said i thought i saw you down at the creek. i asked did you see anyone outside? then after that i thought to myself my eagle feather protected me from whatever didn't come through my door i still think about it to this day the only person i told was my uncle and he told me youre protected the house was a church. i know what i saw ,felt. the only thing i don't remember is going to bed or sleep,i cant remember going to bed that night or falling asleep.
content.summary: Black it seemed to be large and i looked up and saw a corner.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my 2 cousins and we were getting ready to get in a my cousins car. he hot in and reached over to unlock the doors. at the time i heard a loud sound it sounded like continuos thunder. my cousin armando was standing next to me waiting to get into the car. he suddenly yelled "what the hell is that"! so i looked up. i saw an oval shaped blue light it was the color of blue flame. it was the size of a house and it was hovering over the house across the street from us. it was not an object with lights on it. it was as if it was made of light. i could not see through it. it was definately an object. i moved very slow from east to west. i would say about walking speed. then it took off west so fast i have never seen anything accelerate that fast. i can imagine that at speeds like that, it would cover hundreds of miles in seconds. we started freeking out yelling and running up hill to see if we can see where it went. my other cousin got out the car and asked us what just happend. he did not see anything. im smart enough to know not to put any ideas in anyones head so i say im going to start saying what happend and armando is going to finish it. so i say i heard a rumble sound and you screamed so i looked up. then i pointed at armando, and  he franticly said there was a ufo and the thing took off that way. he then pointed west. my cousin jose wasn't sure what we were talking about but wanted to see for him self. so we drove around the neighborhood looking up for about five minutes. the three of us saw little white light zig zagging around. we stopped the car and jumped out looking up. the white light flew towards and over us. as it got closer it was obvious it was not what me and armando saw,it was a helicopter. a small quiet helicopter. it was flying in pathe the ufo flew. it was if it was looking for what see saw minutes before. there is no way at the speed the helicopter was flying it would catch up to the ufo we saw. we never called the news but we wanted to. we was afraid no one would beleive us. i wouldn't have. i only beleive what i see. i know that that night my cousin and i saw a ufo not of this earth.
content.summary: Oval shaped solid light the size of a house

content.detailedDescription:
We were standing by a campfire,we were looking at all the stars.Theni looked at this one spot,and there was like a star going from one star to another goind straight,then going at another but turning abruptly and going to another.
we all watched this for about 30mins.
content.summary: Starlike object going from star to star making 90degree turns traveling at a speed that is impossible.This was observed by 3men and a 15yr old boy

content.detailedDescription: I saw it while watching a meteor shower. i was sitting next to someone i didnt know and we both talked about it describing everydetail to each other. wish i could talk with that person today. it was kinda copper looking with no lights. diamond shaped. ive only seen something similar photographed by an indian man that got a picture of one hovering over the trees, it looked exactly the same.
content.summary: Flew at meteor shower edge and stopped, did a huge loop toward earth then stopped again at edge of meteor shower, then did another loop toward earth and then shot off toward space in a flash and gets smaller into the distance

content.detailedDescription: On the 21st of july 2014. i saw an red orb floating over petosky mich. i was standing on back porch looking at the stars when i seen this ball of light just floating in the sky in the direction of town. it just stayed there for 5-10 mins. it then started to flot towards the north over the bay. im about.5 mls from the bay with trees and roads between. the orb was tree top level as it headed out over the bay still no sound. there was no winds nor any animals sound. i felt nothing at the time i was watching. no feelings at all. the orb kept its course heading out over the bay when i lost it. this is the third time something like this happened to my.  the others were while i was in the navy. once on the easy costs and once while i was on the west coast. think you for ypu time.
content.summary: Red orb moving west to north. lasted 15-20 mins.

content.detailedDescription: I woke up, at ten forty five had a smoke than got a call. proceeded to go outside to take this call with a friend. than that time was eleven eleven at night. i saw the blood full moon in the sky and heard the owl. thats when my child hood came in my mind of the owl outside my room on the second story of my mothers house came into mind and all the flash backs, of when i was abducted from six years old to when it came apparent and out of mind. i said to my friend there coming for me, i know there coming for me on the phone and she said who. i said i don't know how to explain it. i just can't just forget it. i hung up and smoked another cigarette than went inside. i stayed up till out of fear and paranoia, i felt them watching me. i didn't see the ship. but i knew the grays where coming for me, like they always did in my child hood. i eventually just turned on my television and kept my light on in my room out of fear. after a while its twelve forty five in the morning. im getting tired i'm hearing ringing and dial tone like noises at one eleven thats around the time i passed out also, frequencies and lots of voices. that i couldn't make out. i soon after awhile felt as if in a trance like state and went to sleep. i started almost lucid dreaming about school and friends, soon it went to this outer space like them. im in this blue room of this ship. sorry i don't recall much, but every time i dream i always search for a mirror to look in. i found it and i saw myself. thats when i woke up and it hit me all, almost like a mental inception. i don't really know how to explain it so excuse me i'm better at speaking vocally. anyways. i woke up these three skinny grays. open my door telepathically. wearing and dark shade grey space suit with a red collar, and some kinda square sacred geometry shaped image on the center. they had three rings on the chest to almost. big omniscient almond eyes. indents where the nostrils are, three fingers and a thumb. they soon swarmed me and held me down. while i tried to scream. everything went black except for them and i. i soon wake up later and hour at two eleven shoo ken. with jaw and teeth pain head hurting eyes hurting feet numb spinal shivers, almost like an electric shock up my back and in my rain. ears popping from air elevation and high altitudes. this is not the first time this has happened lately.. its been going on my whole life, and i do not. know what to do. no one believes me, the time i went to barbados may eleventh to the the eighteenth. i saw them take me again there at  the hotel at night as well at two fourteen in the morning. i woke up with images or visions you'd say of them doing it at three fifteen. i went outside to smoke, even though i felt an entity standing in the room with me watching me other than my mother. i soon go outside trying to shrug it off, than drop my cigarette than saw this blue bubble of energy spark while dropping it. than i felt this shock/daze and poof. the bubbles gone. i couldn't fall back to sleep because of the paranoia. i barely go outside at night anymore. let alone typing this i feel like they know that i am. those are the two abductions i can remember the most lately right now. i know theres more..
content.summary: Sleep paralysis, they came in my room. they held me down. they took me.

content.detailedDescription: This was back in the late 80' , 88 to 92 i believe . i was standing out in the back yard and noticed a round amber colored globe  , going up the tennessee river in the distance , running directly beside calvert city kentucky in a west northwesterly direction . as soon as it passed i saw what looked like two jet fighters trailing behind the globe , approximately 1 mile behind . the next morning on the today show they reported an explosion somewhere in the northwest woods without a specific cause as i remember . i figured they shot it down . i have tried to look up the story and the explosion in the northwest woods but to date have been unable to find any mention of it . i didn't know what it was then and still don't but this took place 60 to 75 miles north of fort campbell ky . i was amazed to see it and still feel that way . it wasn't much more than tree top level maybe 500' at the maximum . i watched it till i couldn't see it as it flew out of my range maintaining level unchanging slower flight like they were looking around .
content.summary: Round pulsating amber colored globe followed by what looked like 2 jet fighters .

content.detailedDescription: On sunday night october 26th at 7:00pm in rochester nh on a warm fall night, my husband and i planted a tree at my parents house. to the left of us about 100 feet away we saw a solid grey light about the size of a soccer ball. then appeared the second light same size, same color somewhat obscured by a couple of thin trees. i said to dave, "what is that?" the we decided it was a car. and continued to plant the tree. after that we decided to go in the house to get a flashlight and to take the dog for a walk, not noticing if the lights were still there. coming out of the house i went to the right side of the house and dave went to the left side with the dog. i went to the tree and shined the light over it to show my parents. i then heard dave and decided to meet him in the back. as we came around the side of the house we did not notice if the lights were still there. we decided to take the dog around one more time. as i came around front i saw a big stick and picked it up. we went to the other side of the house and threw the stick in the brook. came back around and as we rounded the corner of the house we saw a fifteen to twenty foot round circle with 10 to 15 milky red lights hovering where the grey lights were. i went in the house to get the kids and dave continued to walk the dog for some reason lacking interest to find out what that was. as we came out it was gone. later that night we were talking about what we saw. our first conclusion was that it could not have been a car as the river runs behind the house. secondly, the two sets of lights did not illuminate us or the area. third, it did not make any noise. the next day we decide to investigate and went to the edge of the property where we saw the ufo and noticed a wetland island where the brook and river split. on the island the was a perfect circle where the vegetation was depressed. this is the most recent event. i have seen seven other sightings and an entity.
content.summary: two grey lights that didn't illuminate. a fifteen to twenty foot circle with 10 to 15 lights that didn't illuminate

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to smoke a cigar as is my habit before going to bed. my wife and i had just moved back to the us after some time overseas and were staying with my parents in law.  i immediately saw lights in the sky, stationary but pulsating.  shortly thereafter a beam of light emitted from the hovering structure and seemed to touch the earth..Perhaps a half mile away.  then the beam seemed to search and probe around the area. i watched for a while and then went and got my mother-in-law who was the only other person awake...She saw it too.  she told me to call her cousin who worked for a local news station. i did, apologizing for the late hour but told her i was witnessing a ufo...She was not very receptive and told me to call the news desk and report it.  by this time the light show was over and i went to sleep.  i often think about this event and still get goose bumps.
content.summary: Went outside to smoke a cigar before going to bed and immediately saw lights and a beam in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: We were eating a sandwich behind our motel and saw 5 round objects appear at horizon like where the ocean and the sky meet. they appeared instantly in a straight line for about 10 minutes and then each light went off one at a time
content.summary: We were in our vehicle when 5 spheres. came on at one time went off one at a time
